title: Journalists Who Spread Fake News Are Taint to Profession: Kovind
subtitle: Asserting that the din of the "breaking news syndrome" has consumed the media, President Ram Nath Kovind on Monday, 20 January, said fake news has emerged as a new menace whose purveyors proclaim themselves as journalists and taint the noble profession.
author: www.thequint.com
vclaim:
We'll get through this! Meanwhile, here's all you need to know about the Coronavirus outbreak to keep yourself safe, informed, and updated.
